articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as Bangladesh play Sri Lanka in Delhi in the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: World Cup: Bangladesh v Sri Lanka - clips, radio & text

articles.description: Reaction as Luis Diaz dedicates Liverpool equaliser to missing father and Nottingham Forest beat in-form Aston Villa, plus send in your questions.
articles.title: Reaction as Diaz clinches point for Liverpool & latest football news

articles.description: The World Cup match between Bangladesh and Sri Lanka in Delhi goes ahead despite "very unhealthy" air quality.
articles.title: Bangladesh play Sri Lanka in 'very unhealthy' air

articles.description: Fernando Alonso produced another extraordinary performance to claim a thrilling third place in the Sao Paulo Grand Prix, writes Andrew Benson.
articles.title: 'Alonso masterclass burnishes the legend of one of the greatest'

articles.description: It was an epic weekend of FA Cup first-round action, but who scored the best goal? Cast your vote.
articles.title: Vote for best goal of the FA Cup first round

articles.description: Watch as Sri Lanka's Angelo Mathews becomes the first player in international cricket history to be timed out before facing his first ball in their World Cup match against Bangladesh.
articles.title: Watch Sri Lanka's Mathews timed out before facing first ball

articles.description: Brain injury charity Headway calls for stronger action on concussion protocol since Manchester United defender Harry Maguire was allowed to play on after taking a blow to the head against Fulham.
articles.title: Headway 'concerned' after Maguire concussion incident

articles.description: Manchester City manager Gareth Taylor accuses Arsenal boss Jonas Eidevall of "bullying" the fourth official during their WSL match on Sunday.
articles.title: Arsenal boss bullied official, says Man City manager

articles.description: Colombian-born Liverpool footballer Luis Díaz begs for his father's kidnappers to free him immediately.
articles.title: Footballer Díaz begs father's ELN kidnappers to free him

articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles edge a tough battle with the Dallas Cowboys to go 8-1 after the Kansas City Chiefs hang on to beat the Miami Dolphins 21-14 in Frankfurt.
articles.title: Eagles edge Cowboys to earn eighth win
